integration_patterns: REST API for integration with EHRs

evidence.claim: AutoRamp utilizes AWS cloud services for its platform infrastructure.
The company has a HIPAA-compliant infrastructure for handling healthcare data.
AutoRamp offers a REST API designed for integration with Electronic Health Records (EHR) systems.
They employ Kafka for real-time data streaming and processing.
The platform supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found supporting X12 or clearinghouse use cases.
